description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dropped into a lush planet you must fly and fight your way through perilous defenses and find the Big Button! Danger abounds! Artillery, mines, pointy things and more!
